title: St Giuseppe Moscati Novena
description: St Giuseppe Moscati was an Italian doctor and professor who brought his faith into the practice of medicine and into science. Pray this novena for bachelors, doctors, physicians, people rejected by Religious Orders, and for biochemistry.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

O Saint Giuseppe Moscati, doctor with a huge heart, in the exercise of your profession you cured the body and spirit of your patients. Turn towards us, too, who now run to you with faith in your intercession. Give us physical and spiritual health, so that we can serve our brothers with generosity. Alleviate the pain of those that suffer, give comfort to the sick, consolation to the afflicted, and hope to the hopeless. Make that the sick might encounter doctors like you, human and Christian. The youth find in you a model of life, the workers, an example, the old, comfort, and the dying, hope in eternal salvation. Be for all of us a sure guide. Teach us to work with serenity, honesty and charity, to be able to complete in a Christian way our everyday tasks. (mention request here‚Ä¶) Amen.

Lord Thou great physician, we kneel before Thee. Since every good and perfect gift must come from Thee, please give skill to our hands, clear vision to our minds, kindness and sympathy to our hearts. Give us singleness of purpose, strength to lift at least part of the burden of our suffering fellowmen, and a true realization of the rare privilege that is ours. Take from our hearts all guile and worldliness, that with the simple faith of a child, we may rely on Thee. Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St Giuseppe Moscati, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
